results.name: Imaginary part of (1+2i)^n.
comment: The absolute values of these numbers are the even numbers x such that x^2 + y^2 = 5^n with x and y coprime. See A098122. - _T. D. Noe_, Apr 14 2011
reference: N. J. A. Sloane and Simon Plouffe, The Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences, Academic Press, 1995 (includes this sequence).

formula: For all n, a(n) = - [M^n]_1,2, where M = [1, -2; 2, 1]. - _Simone Severini_, Apr 25 2007
